search_results.snippet: Mobutu Sese Seko. Mobutu Sese Seko Kuku Ngbendu Wa Za Banga [a] (/mbutu sse sko/; born Joseph-Desir Mobutu; 14 October 1930  7 September 1997) was the military dictator and President of the Democratic Republic of the Congo (which Mobutu renamed Zaire in 1971) from 1965 to 1997.
